content: here s how i do that 1 take a smaller gauge dpn and carefully pick up one leg of each stitch along one side 20 stitches use your rescue row to help you if needed 2 carefully thread those 20 stitches onto your long circular needle 3 turn the piece around and use the dpn to pick up the 20 stitches on the other side pull the long needle out for magic loop and thread those 20 stitches onto the long circular needle 4 begin working rounds below working the base of the tail it is a little tricky keeping track of where your bor is for this section although you will be working in magic loop you are really working back and forth 20 stitches on each side so you can t really put a bor marker because at the end of every round it falls off tie a little piece of scrap yarn or put a little locking stitch marker where the rescue row is knotted and where you began picking up stitches this is your beginning of round since you ll be knitting one side then the other side one side then the other side you just need a location for your bor so you can make sure you work a complete round before going on to the next one hope that makes sense i ve written the base of the tail rounds in 2 parts so you can put a check mark beside them as you work them to help you keep track base of tail round 1 side a k20 side b k20 base of tail round 2 side a * k1 kfb * side b * k1 kfb * base of tail round 3 side a * k2 p1 * side b * k2 p1 * base of tail round 4 side a * kfb k1 p1 * side b * kfb k1 p1 * base of tail round 5 side a * k1 p1 * side b * k1 p1 * hat #43 fish adult size v1 2 base of tail round 6 side a * k1 p1 * side b * k1 p1 * base of tail round 7 side a * k1 p1 * side b * k1 p1 * base of tail round 8 side a * k1 p1 * side b * k1 p1 * as you work the next round place a distinctive marker at the mid-point after 40 stitches base of tail round 9 side a * k1 p1 * side b * k1 p1 * base of tail round 10 side a * k1 p1 * side b * k1 p1 * starting at the point you just ended your last round and which should be your beginning of round thread a rescue row thread through and knot it here work the next round base of tail round 11 side a * k1 p1 * side b * k1 p1 * wrap and turn row on
